Class Reporter

java.lang.Object
ca.yorku.cmg.cnsim.engine.reporter.Reporter
public class Reporter extends Object
Handles all main measurement and reporting for simulations. Meant to be used via its static methods. Supports three log actions which add a line to the corresponding file: 1. Events: adds a log line every time an event is processed. 2. Transactions: adds a log line for every transaction arrival event. 3. Nodes: adds a new line for every node known to the simulator. This happens at the end of the simulator. Additional measurements and files can be produced by other classes (e.g., Nodes, Structures).
Author:
Sotirios Liaskos for the Conceptual Modeling Group @ York University`

    • addEvent

      public static void addEvent(int simID, long evtID, long simTime, long sysTime, String evtType, int nodeInvolved, long objInvolved)
      Adds a line to the event log with information about the event.
      Parameters:
      simID - The simulation ID.
      evtID - ID of the event.
      simTime - Simulation time in which the event is happening.
      sysTime - Real time in which the event is happening.
      evtType - The Type of the event.
      nodeInvolved - The Node involved in the event.

    • addTx

      public static void addTx(int simID, long txID, float size, float value, long simTime)
      Adds an entry to the transaction log with information about the transaction.
      Parameters:
      simID - The simulation ID.
      txID - Transaction ID
      size - Transaction size in bytes
      value - Transaction value in local tokens.
      simTime - Time transaction arrived in system

    • addNode

      public static void addNode(int simID, int nodeID, float hashPower, float electricPower, float electricityCost, double totalCycles)
      Adds an entry to the nodes log with information about the node.
      Parameters:
      simID - The simulation ID.
      nodeID - Node ID
      hashPower - Hashpower of the node (hashes/second)
      electricPower - The power consumed by the node (Watts)
      electricityCost - The electricity cost per kWh of the node
      totalCycles - The total hashes the node performed

    • addNetEvent

      public static void addNetEvent(int simID, int from, int to, float bandwidth, long simTime)
      Adds an entry to the network log with information about an event that establishes or updates the bandwidth between two nodes. For static networks only initial network creation is reported here. For dynamic networks any change in the bandwidth between two nodes is reported. Zero bandwidth means no link.
      Parameters:
      simID - The simulation ID.
      from - The node from which the link is established
      to - The node to which the link is established
      bandwidth - The speed of the link
      simTime - The time at which the event happened

    • addBeliefEntry

      public static void addBeliefEntry(int simID, int node, long tx, boolean believes, long simTime)
      Adds an entry to the belief log. Each entry
      Parameters:
      simID - The simulation ID.
      node - The ID of the node whose belief is registered.
      tx - The transaction the node's belief about its validity is registered.
      believes - Whether the node believes the transaction is valid and "final". Will report false if the transaction is not in the structure or has not been seen before.
      simTime - The time at which the report is produced.

    • addErrorEntry

      public static void addErrorEntry(String errorMsg)
      Adds an entry to the error log.
      Parameters:
      errorMsg - The custom error message.

    • flushEvtReport

      public static void flushEvtReport()
      Save reporter's event log to file. File name is "EventLog - [Simulation Date Time].csv"

    • flushInputReport

      public static void flushInputReport()
      Save reporter's transaction log to file. File name is "Input - [Simulation Date Time].csv"

    • flushNodeReport

      public static void flushNodeReport()
      Save reporter's node log to file. File name is "Nodes - [Simulation Date Time].csv"

    • flushNetworkReport

      public static void flushNetworkReport()
      Save reporter's network log to file. File name is "NetLog - [Simulation Date Time].csv"

    • flushBeliefReport

      public static void flushBeliefReport()
      Save reporter's belief log to file. File name is "BeliefLog - [Simulation Date Time].csv"

    • flushErrorReport

      public static void flushErrorReport()
      Save reporter's error log to file. File name is "ErrorLog - [Simulation Date Time].csv"

    • flushConfig

      public static void flushConfig()
      Export configuration. File name is "Config - [Simulation Date Time].csv"
